attributes.review: WHATS THE POINT OF THIS APP??? i cant open it and ever since downloading its made my phone so messed up. I just wanted to see the news from my president. this is horrible! never download!
attributes.title: messed up my phone!

attributes.review: This app does absolutely nothing except constantly pester me about giving someone money and it constantly crashes
attributes.title: Doesn’t do anything

attributes.review: stole all of my data to use against me, WAY more threatening than tiktok and should be taken down immediately
attributes.title: awful app, would give 0 stars if i could

attributes.review: Trump himself came and asked for the keys to my house. When I said no, he tried to poof me with his fairy cheeto dust and sent his oompa loompas after me. Horrible.😿 expected it to be much better since he is so great.😾😾
attributes.title: Completely awful

attributes.review: I did not see the point of this app, coming from a true person of color i hate this app, because of what it stands for therefore it should be deleted.
attributes.title: This app is not good

attributes.review: Terrible app! As soon as I opened the app a clip of a man defecating began to play! But get this, that’s not even the worst part! Actual feces began to spout from the charging port and speakers of my phone! It was a long clean up. Thanks for nothing trump 😡.
attributes.title: ⚠️feces warning ⚠️

attributes.review: I’ve played horror games before but this one like once I got on the the app there was a huge jump scare with this orange Cheeto and that scared me and my family I had nightmares for weeks like no don’t get this app 💀
attributes.title: Omg

attributes.review: I opened the app just to see trump’s little cheeto dangling. i was so disturbed that i threw up all night and had kidney failure and had to get immediate surgery. i don’t recommend this app especially since he’s a ra_ist with p or c
attributes.title: Disturbing

attributes.review: This app is SO SO BAD. Would give it 0 stars if I could. It should be deleted from the App Store!!! Crashed my phone and actually caused it to catch on fire. I had to buy a whole new phone. Worst app ever!
attributes.title: Horrifying!!

attributes.review: it kept crashing on me and i couldn’t even go into it for one second w put it crashing. i powered off my phone and turned it on and it still crashed!!!
attributes.title: THIS APP NEEDS TO BE REMOVED
